Strike Me Instead.name: Strike Me Instead
Strike Me Instead.fullText:
Justiciar Utility 12Strike Me Instead

You call upon your innate sense of justice and honor, whisper a short prayer, and redirect an attack so that you take the hit for those you would protect.

Daily        Divine
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is attacked

Effect: The attack misses all of your allies it targets, but automatically hits you even if you weren’t a target of the attack.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 102.
Strike Me Instead.flavor: You call upon your innate sense of justice and honor, whisper a short prayer, and redirect an attack so that you take the hit for those you would protect.
Strike Me Instead.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is attacked
Strike Me Instead.effect: The attack misses all of your allies it targets, but automatically hits you even if you weren’t a target of the attack.

Just Radiance.name: Just Radiance
Just Radiance.fullText:
Justiciar Attack 11Just Radiance

A burst of light, like purity and justice, explodes from your holy symbol, sending searing pain through enemies you have challenged.

Encounter        Divine, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make an attack that does not include you.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 102.
Just Radiance.flavor: A burst of light, like purity and justice, explodes from your holy symbol, sending searing pain through enemies you have challenged.
Just Radiance.target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst
Just Radiance.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make an attack that does not include you.

Challenge the Unjust.name: Challenge the Unjust
Challenge the Unjust.fullText:
Justiciar Attack 20Challenge the Unjust

Your enemies surround you, and the purity within you cries out for justice. You focus a powerful prayer through your holy symbol, sending forth a radiant burst of punishing force that no enemy can ignore.

Daily        Divine, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Close burst 10

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 102.
Challenge the Unjust.flavor: Your enemies surround you, and the purity within you cries out for justice. You focus a powerful prayer through your holy symbol, sending forth a radiant burst of punishing force that no enemy can ignore.
Challenge the Unjust.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Challenge the Unjust.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
